description:
Add a little extra protection to your Crosswing. This lightweight shade lets you add a wall to your awning, so you don’t need to reposition the car as often. Anchor points and guy lines let you fine tune the positioning, just like with a tent fly.

  • Canopy is made from a waterproof 210D PU coated polyester
  • Connects to the Crosswing with integrated aluminum toggles
  • Includes 3 aluminum ground anchors for guying out the bottom
  • Unpacked dimensions: 5ft. version 141 x 198cm, 7ft. version 211.5 x 198cm
  • Packed dimensions: 5ft. version 20 X 18 X 5cm, 7ft. version 21 X 19 X 5.6cm
  • Includes a storage bag
name: Kammok Crosswing Side Shade
